com.satori.rtm.auth

Interface AuthProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RoleSecretAuthProvider

    public interface AuthProvider
    Defines the authentication interface for RTM clients.

    RoleSecretAuthProvider is an implementation of AuthProvider that provides role-based authentication.

    To set an authenticator for the client, pass it to RtmClientBuilder.setAuthProvider().

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<java.lang.Void> authenticate(Connection connection)
      Asynchronously authenticates a user for a previously established connection.

    • Method Detail

      • authenticate

        com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<java.lang.Void> authenticate(Connection connection)
        Asynchronously authenticates a user for a previously established connection.

        This method returns a ListenableFuture that completes when the authentication is complete.

        Parameters:
        connection - Previously established connection.
        Returns:
        Result of an asynchronous authentication.
        See Also:
        Connection
